Name: Finding Lumber
Author: TangleFire360
SendMessage: &4&l[name]:&f Oh? Hello new friend!
&4&l[name]:&f Looking for wood are you? Well I can help with that.
&4&l[name]:&f There's wood all over the place here, and in all different types!
&4&l[name]:&f Say, why don't you explore and find out where all the different wood is?
&4&l[name]:&f What do you mean you don't need wood!? Everyone needs wood!
&4&l[name]:&f But if you're fine with only using what you pick up from those annoying goblins then okay...
&4&l[name]:&f Come talk to me again if you want to learn where different woods are.
&4&l[name]:&f Let's get started then!
&4&l[name]:&f Why don't you go get some oak logs?
&4&l[name]:&f You should figure out where they are by the time you have &4&l32 Oak Logs&f.
&4&l[name]:&f Wait you don't know where the oak is around here!?
&4&l[name]:&f It's quite literally all over the place! The miners use it some to prop up their tunnels.
&4&l[name]:&f You should be able to find &4&l32 Oak Logs&f if you just look around here some.
&4&l[name]:&f That wasn't too hard was it?
&4&l[name]:&f Another common wood to find around here is acacia.
&4&l[name]:&f Go get &4&l32 Acacia Logs&f and come back, shouldn't take you too long.
&4&l[name]:&f That's not enough for you to have found &4&l32 Acacia Logs&f
&4&l[name]:&f It's all around the walls of these mines, the miners complain about running into wood all the time!
&4&l[name]:&f Blends in doesn't it? You must have good eyes.
&4&l[name]:&f But now it gets a little harder, the other four types of wood aren't as easy to get in large amounts.
&4&l[name]:&f Don't believe me? Go get &4&l32 Dark Oak Logs&f then.
&4&l[name]:&f Couldn't find it ey?
&4&l[name]:&f Well, some of the mining equipment is made of dark oak logs, but if you don't want to destroy those then try over by the pit.
&4&l[name]:&f Straight ahead, right next to one of those pesky Bone Snipers, you can get &4&l32 Dark Oak Logs&f there easily.
&4&l[name]:&f Looks like you found it!
&4&l[name]:&f Half-way my friend, and I'll even cut you some slack and send you after spruce next.
&4&l[name]:&f Find &4&l32 Spruce Logs&f, and don't be afraid to grab a few extra if you want.
&4&l[name]:&f Huh, I thought if you could find all the others you could find spruce too.
&4&l[name]:&f Here I'll give you a hint.
&4&l[name]:&f Try looking up around this area with the portal.
&4&l[name]:&f You should be able to reach a few of those trees and get &4&l32 Spruce Logs&f.
&4&l[name]:&f There may be some other spots with spruce, but those must be deeper in the mines.
&4&l[name]:&f Speaking of going deeper in the mines...
&4&l[name]:&f Birch and jungle wood are guarded a little more heavily than the other woods.
&4&l[name]:&f If you haven't already, you may want to talk to Jerry in your kingdom about making some tools with the wood you have so far.
&4&l[name]:&f Once you're ready, go find &4&l32 Birch Logs&f.
&4&l[name]:&f And now you see why I told you to get some tools first right?
&4&l[name]:&f If you want to save some time, try going to the pond.
&4&l[name]:&f Careful, you have to go past the pit to get there, and the pond is dangerous.
&4&l[name]:&f After all, that's where we found Rick's body when he got killed by that golden chicken...
&4&l[name]:&f Don't worry though, you only need to collect &4&l32 Birch Logs&f, so you shouldn't be there too long.
&4&l[name]:&f Almost done friend!
&4&l[name]:&f I've asked a lot of you, but trust me you'll thank me for it later.
&4&l[name]:&f There's only one more type of wood, jungle, and it's pretty deep in the mines too.
&4&l[name]:&f Go find the jungle wood and get &4&l32 Jungle Logs&f.
&4&l[name]:&f Haven't found it yet? Don't feel too bad about that.
&4&l[name]:&f There's only one spot in these mines with jungle wood, in the tunnels over by the pond.
&4&l[name]:&f And if you thought surviving the pond was hard, there are almost always three or four goblins by the jungle wood.
&4&l[name]:&f I get that &4&l32 Jungle Logs&f can be a lot, but it isn't too bad with a trusty axe in your hand!
&4&l[name]:&f Hey you Got it!
&4&l[name]:&f Congrats! You've gotten a good haul of wood for your wood-based needs, and learned something along the way.
&4&l[name]:&f What's that look for? Is there an easier way to get wood?
&4&l[name]:&f Well, if you go to Nicole's Artisan Shop in the hub, she sells leaves.
&4&l[name]:&f If you get lucky, you can get a sapling by breaking just a few leaves, but it can take quite a few sometimes.
&4&l[name]:&f It gets really expensive really quick if you're not lucky, so it's always good to know where you can find wood around here.
&4&l[name]:&f Oh yeah, here's a little something to help you store all that wood you've collected.
